data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Azores, Portugal to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Azores, Portugal
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Azores.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Azores, Portugal to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Azores, Portugal, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Turk people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, let it be said of the 234,353 lost in Azores that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Azores, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Azores to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
